$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**closedBy**: The user who closed the case.

**closedDateTime**: The date and time when the case was closed. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z

**createdDateTime**: The date and time when the entity was created. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z
**custodians**: Returns a list of case custodian objects for this case.  Nullable.
**externalId**: The external case number for customer reference.
**lastModifiedBy**: The last user who modified the entity.

**lastModifiedDateTime**: The latest date and time when the case was modified. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z
**legalHolds**: Returns a list of case legalHold objects for this case.  Nullable.
**noncustodialDataSources**: Returns a list of case noncustodialDataSource objects for this case.  Nullable.
**operations**: Returns a list of case operation objects for this case. Nullable.
**reviewSets**: Returns a list of reviewSet objects in the case. Read-only. Nullable.
**sourceCollections**: Returns a list of sourceCollection objects associated with this case.
**status**: The case status. Possible values are unknown, active, pendingDelete, closing, closed, and closedWithError. For details, see the following table.
**tags**: Returns a list of tag objects associated to this case.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
